div.p:
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xj die
Januarij februarij anno quo supra

The saide day Johne Rede hatmakar grantit him aving to
Jonhne annand' xx ij s' Scottis money quhilkis he borrouit
fra thome terres' his merchande of his gudis quhilkis the balyeis
chargit him to pay within terme of law

The saide day the aldirman In the townis nayme
assignit and ordanit Androw cullan to our tile Ane hald nethis fischingis
of the Raik this yer' ande assignit him to marrow
and streik his half nethis with Johne of cullannis half
eftir the tenour of our' Souerane lordis lettres be the lordis
of counsale decretit tharupon' eftir the forme of his
lettir of Assedacion' vndir the common' sele maid' tharupon'
Of the quhilkis the said Androw askit h Instrument' befor
baxteris Alexander Rede gilbert menyes William blinsele Johne Waus
William colp Dauid colp and Dauid liell

The said' day the aldirman and consale secludit gilbert
tulidef baxtar fra bred' bakin quhile pasche day
next to cum vndir the pane of banision of the tone but
ony dispensacion for the brekin of the statutis of the tone

The saide day Androw litstar tuk to preyve that he hede
pait iiijor s' and ix d' clamit and follouit be Johne thomson'
one Monunday that nixt cumis befor the aldirman and balyeis

The saide day Jonhne nicholsone in futy grauntit that he
sulde pay or ger' pay to george sadlar' xx s' of male
quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to pay within terme of law

The saide day Williame buchane thomas buchane
Richerd' redhede and Donalde baxtar grantit and consentit
of thair avne fre will that gif the tovne happinis to
want ony brede of quhet in thar' defalt or to haue
ony vnsufficient Stuff that thai sale pay Ilkan xl sl
to Sanct nicholes werk vnforgevin

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
xiiijto die februarij anno quo supra

gilbertus menyeis Andreas Cullane Duncanus Colisone
Alexander gray Jonhne' thomsone patricius leslie thomas
Waus Ricardus Waus Malcomus crag Willelmus nicholson
Johannes Annand' patricius Rede et Alexander Kinge burgenses
dicti burgi Iurati dicunt quod quondam thomas prat pater
Agnetis prat latricis presencium obiit ad pacem et fidem
domini nostri Regis et quod dicta Agnes est vna de legittimis et
propinquioribus heredis dicti thome Et quod legittime etatis
ceteri presenti breuis patent in se quia dicta Agnes non pecijt terras
neque annuos Redditus

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis in the tovnis name
Requirit James Jofrasone that he walde Remane within the
tone to scott lott waik and warde as vthiris nichtboris
dois or ellis to Renvnce and ourgif his fredome to the
tone Ande the saide James askit to be avisit quhill
the nixt law day eftir the nixt pasche tile avis' heruntill
and than to Renvnce his fredome or and Reman in the tone

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xviijo
die februarij anno quo supra

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis assignit this day xv
dais to thomas leslie to ansuer to William henrisone
as law will Anent the clame of vij barrelis ter' and xxx stane
of lynt

The xix day of februar the yer' befor writin thir personis Alexander
menyes aldirman Robert blinsele Johne Cullane Alexander chavmer
gilbert menyes Jonhne Wormet Androw Cullane Thomas leslie
Jonhne mar' Dauy mar' Williame blinsele Dauy steuart
patry rede Thomas Waus george bysset Alexander myrton' ande
William nicholson' burges and nychtbouris of the saide burghe consentit
and frelie grantit ale in ane voce concordande to Sett and
to maile latt to Richerd Waus and William Wormet thar
nichtbouris equalie betuix tham the hale fyschingis of ane half
nethis of the pott one the wattir of Dee or ane half neth'
of the furdis one the samyn wattir quhilkis that ples' thame best
to tak that happinnis to Waik at the making of the nixt
generale assidacioun of the said' burghe that happinis to be mad'
fre of ale girssomes for the male alanerly as vthiris nichtbouris
pais for ale the termes of the nixt generale assedacion for thar
gude seruice diligence and labouris done to the tovne in tym' of the
pestilence to giddir with thar' avne takis quhilkis thai haue
In tak of the tvne quhilkis thai and hed' obefor for the Reuertyne half nethis
of the furdis quhilkis thai Josit ande brukit the yer last bigane

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vicesimoprimo
die mensis februarij Anno quosupra

The said day the Bailyeis decernit the comptour being up Dauid
themannis to Dauid mar And the said Dauid mar oblist him
to kep the said Dauid theman skathles tharof at ale handis
havand clame and Enteres' thartile quhilk comptour the said
Dauid mar lent to Johne Westland as he allegit

Robertus blinsele Johannes leslie warderis Johannes
Wormet Alexander blinsele Andreas Cullane Duncanus Colison'
Thomas Waus Alexander gray Richardus Waus Willelmus
Wormet Willelmus Kyntor Duncanus Craik and Malcomus
Crag burgenses dicti burgi Jurati dicunt quod quondam Dauid
Spens patris Johannis Spens latoris presencium obiit vltra
vestitus et vestitus ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem dominj
nostri Regis de dimidietate cuiusdem terre cum pertinens Jacente
infra dictum dictum burgum in le gastraw ex occidentali
parte eiusdem vici inter terram quondam thome mar' ex Australi
ex vna et terram dominj Andree gray et Alexandro Ramson'
ex boreali partibus ab altera et communiem viam regiam versus oriens
et torrentem ad aqueductum molendinorum discendendum versus
occidens Et quod dictus Johannes est legittimus et propinquior heres quondam
dicti Dauid patricij suj de dictum dimidietate terre cum pertinencijs Et
quod est legittime etatis Et quod valet nunc per annum xiij s' iiij d' et valuit vj s' viij d' tempore pacis Et quod tenetur in capite de Supprimo domino
nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium Et nunc existit In manibus alexandri
burnat filij et heredis apparentis alexandri burnat de leys virtute cuiusdam Instrumenti
Sigillis Johannis mar' et Richardi Waus duorum balliuorum eiusdem
burgi Sigillati

The said day Dauid tailyeour protestit that quhat that the Baillies
or Dauid mar did anent the said comptour suld turne him nor
his wif and cristiane Westland' pretendand to haue enteres' tharto to
na preiudice

The saide day thir personis vndir writin Jonhne leslie of wardris
James Colisone Duncan Colisone William Kintor Jonhne Waus
Alexander gray thomas Waus Androw Cullan thome Narne Duncan
Craik Alexander myrtone Malcum crag Jonhne Sratone Walter howson'
patry rede Dauy talyour' gilbert tulidef Jonhne Cullan thome
lammyntone Johne Rede wobstar thome gledstane thome meldrum
Thome chepman Androw body thome menyes Dauy mar' yongar
Dauy ruthirfurd William vmfray Jonhne Auchneyve henry
Rede and thome chepman burgis and nichtbouris of this burghe opinly
Inquerit of thar avne fre will grantit Consent ande
effectuyslie promittit to Richerde Waus and Williame Wormet
ane half nethis fischingis of the furdis pott one he wattir'
of dee ir ane half of the furdis quhilkis that ples' tham
best to tak that happinis to waik girssome fre payand
the penny maile alanerlie ffor al the termes of the next generale
assedacioun to be maide eftir the termes of fyve fra the vigill
of SanctAndrow Inmediatlie bigane befor the date of this
court to be Runnyn equalie betuix tham togiddir with thar' avne
takis that thai haue now In Assedacioun of the tovne for thar
gude seruice diligence and labour done In the tone In tyme of the
pestilence and for the Renuncing of ane half nethis fischingis of the furdis
quhilkis thai hede and brukit this yer' last bigan

The saide personis Circually Inquerit and the aldirman and balyeis
togiddir with Robert blinsell gilbert menyis Johne Wormet
William blinsele and Alexander blinsell consentit grantit and promittit
effectuyslie ane quartar of ane nethis fischingis of the pott
or ane quartar of ane nethis fischingis of the furdis one the
wattir of Dee for ale the termes of the next generale
assedacioun to be maid' eftir the termes of fyve yeris fra
the vigill of SanctAndrow immediate gangand befor the
date of this court be Runnyn for girssome fre payand
the penny maile alanerlie togiddir with his avne tak
that he has now of the tone and for his gude seruice diligence
and labour' done to the tovne In tyme of the pestilence

The saide day the aldirman balyeis and personis beforwritin
grantit consentit and promittit to Thomas chapman ane half
nethis fischingis of the furdis at the saide next generale
assedacioun for the termes of the samyn to be maid' eftir
the termes of fyve yeris fra the vigile of SanctAndrow
last bigane be runnyn at the Instance and Request of Alexander
blinsell and for the helping of him to ane demi nethis of
the said wattir for girssome and wale as vthiris pais
for siclik fischingis

The xxiij day of februar' thomas lammynton gledstane gravntit him avande
to thomas lammynton' xix s' and viij d' scottis money to be pait
to the saide thomas lammynton be xxtj days eftir pasche next
hereftir In pennye and penny worthis that sale ples' him of rest'

The said day It was sufficiently previt befor the ballies that the comptour
followit be Dauid mar tailyeour procuratour to the ayris of Johnne' Westlande
as ayrschip to thome arrestit in Dauid themannis handis was Dauid
marris quhilkis he lent tile vmquhile Johnne' Westlande tharfor the ballies
decernit the said comptour to the said Dauid mar and ordanit Dauid theman
to deliuere him the sammyn And the said Dauid mar oblist him to kep the said
Dauid theman skathles of the said comptour handis havand enteres' tharto
becaus It was arrestit in his handis

Curia balliuorum Burgi de Aberdene tenta In pretorio
eiusdem vltimo die mensis februarij Anno quosupra

The said day Johne crukschank lauchfully callit tile haue
followit the borgh' strekit be him one Johne brekath' and nocht
comperit for the wrangwis' withhaldin fra him of xv s' ix d'
as Is allegit And the said Johne brekantht protestit to be quyt
of the said Johnis chalang vnto the tyme he be new warnit
and protestit for his costis and expens' sustenit be him tharuntill
for the quhilkis the said Johne crukschank was in amerciament of the
court

The said day the baillies assignit friday that nixt cumis
to thomas Riddaill thome gardane William scrogis Johne'
cuk William harpar Robert Walcar and Johne Kennerty till
ansuer to the borgh' strekit one thame be Johne Ratre
procuratour for alexander Annande for the wrangwis' Intro
metting with ane barrell of ter pertening to the said alexander
and ordand the copy of the borgh' to be deliuerit to the partj one
thar expens'

The said day Johne Red hatmakar deponit the gret bodely aitht
that he gef and deliuerit to Johne of lammyntone thre or four yeris
bigane ane franch' crovne at command and behalf of Johne brogane
and tuk fra the said Johne lamyntone of the said franche crowne
xxxij d' agane for ane hat that the saidis Johne' brogan bocht fra him

The saide day thome philp come Souerte be his hande vphaldin
to pay to thome Waus ane barrell of Salmond' at the
fest of Sanct Johne the baptist callit mydsommer' nixt to cum
or within xv dais thareftir for Johne low and the siad Johne oblist
him be his hand to freithe the said' thomas and to pay the
said' barrell of Salmond'

Secundo die mensis marcij anno quo supra Johannes leslie de Warderis In presencia
thome leslie balliuj pro se et Annabella gordon' sponsa sua
fecit constituit creauit et Nominauit gilbertum menyeis Johannem mar' et
patricium leslie coniunctim et diuisim suos legitimmos procuratores actores et factores
ad prosequendum plegium porrectum sibi Johannem ruthirfurd' militem
pro octo libris monete scocie Agendum defendendum et prosequendum
promittens de Rato et grato in vberior' forma procuratorij Cum ceteris
clausulis necesseriis et Oportunis Solitis et

quarto die marcij anno quo supra Johannes ruthirfurde miles fecit constituit
et nominauit Duncanum fyf suum legittimum procuratorem Actorem et factorem dans
et concedens eidem suam potestatem et ad respondendum plegio super ipsum aliis
per Johannem leslie de Warderis pro se et annabella gordone Sponsa
sua porrecto Agendum respondendum defendendum et promittens de Rato et
grato in vberiore forma procuratorij Cum ceteris clausulis necesseriis et
Oportunis Solitis et Consuetis

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem quarto
die marcij anno quo supra

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' William
blinsele forspekar that Elizabetht setone sall ger' mak the yet
of the forlande quhar' Jonhne of mar' duellis pertening to hir
in coniunctfeftment Sufficient as efferis in ale possibile hast and
falyeing tharof to ger' tak the malys of the said lande and mak
the saide yet sufficient

The said day the borgh' strekit be Johne lesly of Warderis vppoun'
Ser Johne ruthirfurd knicht for viij li' was continewit with Consent
of that procuratouris of baitht the partijs vndir hop of concord quhile this
day viij dais the xij day of marche in siclik forme and effect as It
is now without preiudice of ony partie

The said day Williame Scrogis Robert Walcar and thomas gardane grantit
thame to pay thar part of the barrell of ter clamyt be the procuratouris
of alexander Annand

The said day comperit Will scherar litster offerand him reddy tile
ansuer to the borght strekit one him be Williame Chesame quhilk
comperit nocht quharfor the said Williame protestit that sene he comperit
nocht to folloue the said borgh' that he micht be quyt of his chalang
vnto the tyme he be new warnit

The said day Comperit thomas chapman and offerit him Reddy to
ansuer to the borgh' strekit one him be Will blinsele couper quhilk
comperit nocht quharfor the said thomas protestit that sene the said William
comperit nocht to follow the said borgh that he micht be quyt of
his chalang vnto the tyme he be new warnit

Eodem die thomas tailyeour in ffuty conuictus fuit per assisam
per os patricij leslie prelocutor eiusdem pro perturbio gilbertj monrow
cui emendabit ut Jura volunt

Eodem die gilbertus monrow conuictus fuit per dictam assisam
pro iniusta perturbacione prefati thome tailyour cui emendabit ut
Jura volunt et cetera

The said day thomas lesly offerit him reddy tile vnderly the
law in ony thing that Will hendirson' hed to say tile him anent
the clame of vij barrell of ter and xxx stane of lynt as the
said Williamez borgh' proportis

The saide day thome philp oblist him be his hande vphaldin
to content and pay to thomez Waus burgis of the said burghe'
In the name of Johne low ane barrele of Salmonde full
Rede and Suet gude and Sufficient merchande gude of the Richtuis'
bynde of Abirdene at the fest of Sanct Johne the baptist callit
mydsommer' nixt eftir follouing the date of thir lettres or within fiftene
dais thareftir at the farrast vnrepreuit Ande the saide Johne low
oblisit him be his hande vphaldin to freithe and keip the saide thomez
philp skathtles Anent the pament of the said' ane barrele of salmond'

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem septimo
die mensis marcij Anno quo supra

The said day William Ranisone followit nocht thome beg for ony strub
lance he had done to him and his seruandis

The said day It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' patrik lesly for
spekar that peter Walcar had nocht done his labour as he aucht to
ane pes' of clatht pertening to margaret buchane' And atour the said peter William Walcar
come souerte to bring his fadir one friday that nixt cumis and ples' the said
margaret for the skatht done to hir said margaretis clatht

The said day Williame Ranisone was conuict be ane suorne assis'
patrik lesly forspekar for strublance of Thome beg for the quhilk he
was in amerciament of the court and till amend as law will and forber In
tyme tocum And the said thomas quyt of ale strublance of the said
Williame and the said William sale pay a li' of wax to the haly blud licht et cetera

The said day Dauid Ruthirfurd was conuict be the said assis' patrik lesly
forspekar for strublance of thome beg for the quhilk he was in amerciament
of the court and tile amend as law will et cetera And the said thomas quyt of ale
strublance of him

The said day Dauid Rutherfurd in the Name of Eby Ranisone his
wif was conuict be the assis' forsaid for strublance of Agnes stirue
ling for the quhilkis he was in amerciament of the court et cetera And the said
Agnes quit of ale strublance of the said Eby Ranisone

Eodem die Johannes Crukschank deuenit plegius legalis quod thomas
beg erit Indempnes pro Dauid Ruthirfurd et parte sua aliter quam per viam
Juris Et Alexander myrtone deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus Dauid
erit Indempnis pro dicto thoma et cetera aliter quam er viam Juris Et Willelmus
Ranisone deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus thomas erit Indempnis pro
Willelmo fynne et thoma michelson aliter quam per viam Juris Et
Alexander myrtone deuenit plegius legalis quod dicti Willelmus et thomas
erunt Indempnes pro dicto thoma aliter quam per viam Juris
Et quilibet dictarum parcium obligatur ad Releuandum suos plegios de
huiusmodi fideiussione

The said day It was ordand and deliuerit be the Counsaill
and the assis' that gif thar happinis ony strublance betuix William
Ramsone Dauid Ruthirfurd and his wif one that ane part and thome beg
one that vthir part that the partj that happinis to commit ony strub
lance till vthir the party that happinnis to be conuict' sall pay to sanct
nicholes' werk xl s' vnforgevin
